name: CreateFreshserviceLocation
description:
Create a new location in Freshservice.

This tool is used to create a new location within the Freshservice platform. It should be called when there's a need to add a new location to the system, such as a new office or branch.

parameters.name: location_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the new location. Must be an integer.

parameters.name: location_name
parameters.description: The name of the location to be created in Freshservice.

parameters.name: parent_location_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the parent location to create a hierarchical structure with a parent location in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the parent location

parameters.name: primary_contact_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact requester, referencing their name, email, and phone from requester details.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email and phone number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_line_1
parameters.description: The first line of the street address for the location.

parameters.name: address_line_2
parameters.description: The second line of the address, used for additional address details like suite or apartment number.

parameters.name: location_city
parameters.description: The city where the new location will be based.

parameters.name: location_address_state
parameters.description: The name of the state where the location is situated. It should be a string representing the state name.

parameters.name: country_name
parameters.description: Country name where the location is situated.

parameters.name: location_zip_code
parameters.description: The zip code of the new location in Freshservice.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the location

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the location

parameters.name: parent_location_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the parent location

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the parent location

parameters.name: primary_contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email and phone number will be referenced from the requester details)

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email and phone number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_line1
parameters.description: Address Line 1

parameters.name: address_line2
parameters.description: Address Line 2

parameters.name: address_city
parameters.description: City

parameters.name: address_state
parameters.description: State

parameters.name: address_country
parameters.description: Country

parameters.name: address_zipcode
parameters.description: Zip Code of the Location
